text:
e="preserve">Vijay Reddy (1936 – 9 October 2020) was an Indian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Tadepalligudem, Andhra Pradesh. His career began in 1970 and he retired in 2003. He directed "Gandhada Gudi", "Mayura" and "Mojugara Sogasugara". His first movie was "Rangamahal Rahasya" and his last was "Hrudayanjali".
Vijay died at a hospital in Chennai on 9 October 2020 from cardiac arrest at the age of 84.
